TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler(object sender, OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs -> unit

summary.span: Reprezentuje metodę, która będzie obsługiwać zdarzenia .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Po utworzeniu delegata, możesz zidentyfikować metody, która będzie obsługiwać zdarzenia.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Aby skojarzyć zdarzenia z programu obsługi zdarzeń, należy dodać wystąpienie delegata zdarzenia.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Program obsługi zdarzeń jest wywoływany przy każdym wystąpieniu zdarzenia, o ile nie usunięto delegata.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. ## Examples Poniższy przykład kodu pokazuje, otwierając strumień do zapisania danych do przekazania.The following code example demonstrates opening a stream to write data to be uploaded. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#16)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#16)] Poniższa metoda jest wywoływana, gdy strumień jest dostępna.The following method is called when the stream is available. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#15)]
